message: Any chance of people voting this up enough? This si the main pain point for client side scripting in webforms.
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: support multiple runat="server" forms in Web Forms pages
caption: aspnet.uservoice.com
description: support multiple runat="server" forms in Web Forms pages                                Allow for Web Forms pages to contain multiple server-side forms rather than just one. This allows for much better accessibility and usability in the pages.                                                         ...
